jut.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: something that juts out sticks out further than the other things around it
jut.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: Tall jagged rocks jutted out over the beach.
jut.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: if you jut your chin out, you move it so that it sticks forward
jut.translation[0].definitions[1].exampl: She jutted her chin out aggressively as she glowered back at him.
